Sentencas: Hydrogen is considered as one of the best alternatives for fossil fuels, especially when it is produced using renewable energy resources.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: In this paper, dish collector is used to provide the required energy of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) to produce hydrogen.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: Since dish collectors operate at high temperature, they would be an ideal match for high temperature electrolyzers.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: These electrolyzer cells need both thermal and electrical energy to produce hydrogen.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: A compressed air energy storage (CAES) system is used to produce electricity.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: To reduce its fuel consumption, it is combined with a dish collector.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: Another dish collector is also used to produce thermal energy.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: To analyze the system, both thermodynamic and economic analyses are conducted.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: The results showed that the system could produce 41.48 kg/day hydrogen.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: It is shown that efficiency of the power cycle and the electrolyzer cell is equal to 72.69% and 61.70%, respectively and levelized cost of hydrogen is 9.1203 $/kg(H2).
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: To study the effect of key parameters on the system performance, sensitivity analysis is performed.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: It was concluded that maximum and minimum pressure of air cavern in the CAES system have the highest effect on the levelized cost of hydrogen.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector

Sentencas: Also higher operating temperature of the electrolyzer cell benefits the system both thermodynamically and economically.
Titulo: Techno-economic analysis of hydrogen production by solid oxide electrolyzer coupled with dish collector
